game.title: Quest of the Ancient Ruins
game.objective: Find and decipher three ancient artifacts
game.description: A journey to uncover a hidden treasure
game.reward: Gold coins, magical amulet, and a map leading to a secret cave

task.objective: Explore the nearby forest for the first artifact
task.description: Look for a fallen tree with a mysterious symbol carved on it

task.objective: Search the ruins of an ancient temple for the second artifact
task.description: The temple is guarded by a stone guardian, solve its riddle

task.objective: Uncover the secret cave at the coast using the map from the third artifact
task.description: The entrance is behind a large rock, be cautious of sea creatures
